typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		adult_icu_bed_covid_utilization as double,
		adult_icu_bed_covid_utilization_coverage as short,
		adult_icu_bed_covid_utilization_denominator as short,
		adult_icu_bed_covid_utilization_numerator as short,
		adult_icu_bed_utilization as double,
		adult_icu_bed_utilization_coverage as short,
		adult_icu_bed_utilization_denominator as short,
		adult_icu_bed_utilization_numerator as short,
		critical_staffing_shortage_anticipated_within_week_no as short,
		critical_staffing_shortage_anticipated_within_week_not_reported as short,
		critical_staffing_shortage_anticipated_within_week_yes as short,
		critical_staffing_shortage_today_no as short,
		critical_staffing_shortage_today_not_reported as short,
		critical_staffing_shortage_today_yes as short,
		deaths_covid as short,
		deaths_covid_coverage as short,
		hospital_onset_covid as short,
		hospital_onset_covid_coverage as short,
		inpatient_bed_covid_utilization as double,
		inpatient_bed_covid_utilization_coverage as short,
		inpatient_bed_covid_utilization_denominator as integer,
		inpatient_bed_covid_utilization_numerator as short,
		inpatient_beds as integer,
		inpatient_beds_coverage as short,
		inpatient_beds_used as integer,
		inpatient_beds_used_coverage as short,
		inpatient_beds_used_covid as short,
		inpatient_beds_used_covid_coverage as short,
		inpatient_beds_utilization as double,
		inpatient_beds_utilization_coverage as short,
		inpatient_beds_utilization_denominator as integer,
		inpatient_beds_utilization_numerator as integer,
		percent_of_inpatients_with_covid as double,
		percent_of_inpatients_with_covid_coverage as short,
		percent_of_inpatients_with_covid_denominator as integer,
		percent_of_inpatients_with_covid_numerator as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_18_19 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_18_19_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_20_29 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_20_29_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_30_39 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_30_39_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_40_49 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_40_49_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_50_59 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_50_59_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_60_69 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_60_69_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_70_79 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_70_79_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_80_ as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_80_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_unknown as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_confirmed_unknown_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_18_19 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_18_19_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_20_29 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_20_29_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_30_39 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_30_39_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_40_49 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_40_49_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_50_59 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_50_59_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_60_69 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_60_69_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_70_79 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_70_79_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_80 as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_80_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_unknown as short,
		previous_day_admission_adult_covid_suspected_unknown_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_pediatric_covid_confirmed as short,
		previous_day_admission_pediatric_covid_confirmed_coverage as short,
		previous_day_admission_pediatric_covid_suspected as short,
		previous_day_admission_pediatric_covid_suspected_coverage as short,
		reporting_cutoff_start as string,
		staffed_adult_icu_bed_occupancy as short,
		staffed_adult_icu_bed_occupancy_coverage as short,
		staffed_icu_adult_patients_confirmed_and_suspected_covid as short,
		staffed_icu_adult_patients_confirmed_and_suspected_covid_coverage as short,
		staffed_icu_adult_patients_confirmed_covid as short,
		staffed_icu_adult_patients_confirmed_covid_coverage as short,
		state as string,
		total_adult_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_and_suspected_covid as short,
		total_adult_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_and_suspected_covid_coverage as short,
		total_adult_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid as short,
		total_adult_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid_coverage as short,
		total_pediatric_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_and_suspected_covid as short,
		total_pediatric_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_and_suspected_covid_coverage as short,
		total_pediatric_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid as short,
		total_pediatric_patients_hospitalized_confirmed_covid_coverage as short,
		total_staffed_adult_icu_beds as short,
		total_staffed_adult_icu_beds_coverage as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source1 derive(UpdatedDate = currentDate(),
		adult_icu_bed_covid_utilization = toFloat(adult_icu_bed_covid_utilization),
		adult_icu_bed_utilization = toFloat(adult_icu_bed_utilization),
		inpatient_bed_covid_utilization = toFloat(inpatient_bed_covid_utilization),
		inpatient_beds_utilization = toFloat(inpatient_beds_utilization),
		percent_of_inpatients_with_covid = toFloat(percent_of_inpatients_with_covid)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
